newdrift = np.arange(ap.size + 1, ap.size + 10 + 1).reshape(-1, 1)
newxreg = np.concatenate([newdrift, np.sqrt(newdrift)], axis=1)
predict_arima(res_xreg, 10, newxreg=newxreg)
